name: Staff suffer deterioration of skills
description: Staff members demonstrate a diminishing level of skills over time.
notes:
- Are staff members required to possess skills that are practically employed only on an infrequent basis?
- Are skills refreshment opportunities available to staff? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - Repository technical staff are rarely required to recover content from backups, and consequently suffer a deterioration of the appropriate skills to use backup retrieval mechanism
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish means for staff skills refreshment, and for staff to employ skills of limited frequent value in test environment
- Implement staff performance reviews to regularly determine skill levels and training requirements In the event of riskâ€™s execution:
- Provide training facilities to reverse skills haemorrhage
